# Government Tender Announcement

## Inspection and Certification of Alarms, Extinguishers, and Sprinkler Systems

### Invitation to Bidders

Parks Canada invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the inspection and certification of alarms, extinguishers, and sprinkler systems in Jasper National Park.

### Key Details

* Bid solicitation number: 5P420-22-0281/A
* Closing date for bids: 2023-12-14T16:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2024-01-02
* Expected contract end date: 2024-12-31

### Description of Work

The successful bidder will be responsible for performing the required inspection, testing, and maintenance of fire extinguishers, fire alarm systems, automatic sprinkler systems (both wet and dry), standpipe and hose systems, and exit signs in Jasper National Park. The work must be carried out according to the latest edition of the National Model Codes and applicable standards, and certification must be obtained for the inspections.

### Security Requirement

The bid solicitation requires bidders to obtain security clearance for employees working on the project. New personnel security clearance requests will require mandatory fingerprints to initiate the criminal record check.

### Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit is required for all bidders. The visit will be held on November 9, 2023, at various Parks Canada facilities in Jasper, Alberta.

### Tender Requirements

* Bids must be submitted in English or French.
* Bids must be submitted via email or fax to the designated contact.
* Bids must be accompanied by all required documentation and attachments.
* Late submissions will not be considered.
